paragraphs.content: O come, let us sing unto the LORD: let us make a joyful noise to the rock of our salvation.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O come, let us sing unto the Lord: let us make a joyful noise to the rock of our salvation.

paragraphs.content: Let us come before his presence with thanksgiving, and make a joyful noise unto him with psalms.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let us come before his presence with thanksgiving, and make a joyful noise unto him with psalms.

paragraphs.content: For the LORD is a great God, and a great King above all gods.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For the Lord is a great God, and a great King above all gods.

paragraphs.content: In his hand are the deep places of the earth: the strength of the hills is his also.
paragraphs.contentHtml: In his hand are the deep places of the earth: the strength of the hills is his also.

paragraphs.content: The sea is his, and he made it: and his hands formed the dry land.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The sea is his, and he made it: and his hands formed the dry land.

paragraphs.content: O come, let us worship and bow down: let us kneel before the LORD our maker.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O come, let us worship and bow down: let us kneel before the Lord our maker.

paragraphs.content: For he is our God; and we are the people of his pasture, and the sheep of his hand. To day if ye will hear his voice,
paragraphs.contentHtml: For he is our God; and we are the people of his pasture, and the sheep of his hand. To day if ye will hear his voice,

paragraphs.content: Harden not your heart, as in the provocation, and as in the day of temptation in the wilderness:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Harden not your heart, as in the provocation, and as in the day of temptation in the wilderness:

paragraphs.content: When your fathers tempted me, proved me, and saw my work.
paragraphs.contentHtml: When your fathers tempted me, proved me, and saw my work.

paragraphs.content: Forty years long was I grieved with this generation, and said, It is a people that do err in their heart, and they have not known my ways:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Forty years long was I grieved with this generation, and said, It is a people that do err in their heart, and they have not known my ways:

paragraphs.content: Unto whom I sware in my wrath that they should not enter into my rest.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Unto whom I sware in my wrath that they should not enter into my rest.
